long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-coupon is a super simple chrome extension that automatically applies amazon coupons when you navigate to a product page. Once on the page the extension will check for a coupon to be applied and do so without any need for action from the user. Amazon coupons are not automatically applied so most people don't know what they are missing.
